maqras.text: 20|83|aur he moosa! kya cheez tumhen le aaee apanee jaati se pahale
20|84|usane kahaah ve mere peechhe aa hee rahe hain aur main teree seva mein sheeghr aa gaya, he mere paalanahaar! taaki too prasann ho jaaye.
20|85|allaah ne kahaah hamane pareeksha mein daal diya teree jaati ko tere (aane ke) pashchaat aur kupath kar diya hai unhen saamaree[1] ne.

20|86|to moosa vaapas aaya apanee jaati kee or ati krudhd-shokaatur hokar. usane kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! kya tumhen vachan nahin diya tha tumhaare paalanahaar ne ek achchha vachan[1]? to kya tumhen bahut din lag[2] gaye? athava tumane chaaha ki utar jaaye koee prakop tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se? atah tumane mere vachan[3] ko bhang kar diya.

20|87|unhonne uttar diya hamane nahin bhang kiya hai tera vachan apanee ichchha se, parantu hamapar laad diya gaya tha jaati[1] ke aabhooshanon ka bojh, to hamane use phenk[2] diya aur aise hee phenk[3] diya saamaree ne.

20|88|phir vah[1] nikaal laaya unake lie ek bachhade kee moorti, jisakee gaay jaisee dhvani (aavaaz) thee, to sabane kahaah ye hai tumhaara poojy tatha moosa ka poojy, (parantu) moosa ise bhool gaya hai.
20|89|to kya ve nahin dekhate ki vah na unakee kisee baat kee uttar deta hai aur na adhikaar rakhata hai, unake lie kisee haani ka, na kisee laabh ka

20|90|aur kah diya tha haaroon ne isase pahale hee ki he meree jaati ke logo! tumhaaree pareeksha kee gayee hai isake dvaara aur vaastav mein tumhaara paalanahaar atyant krpaasheel hai. atah mera anusaran karo tatha mere aadesh ka paalan karo.
20|91|unhonne kahaah hamasab usee ke pujaaree rahenge, jab tak (toor se) hamaare paas moosa vaapas na aa jaaye.
20|92|moosa ne kahaah he haaroon! kis baat ne tujhe rok diya, jab toone unhen dekha ki kupath ho gaye
20|93|ki mera anusaran na kare? kya toone avagya kar dee mere aadesh kee

20|94|usane kahaah mere maan jaaye bhaee! meree daadhee na pakad aur na mera sir. vaastav mein, mujhe bhay hua ki aap kahenge ki toone vibhed utpann kar diya banee israeel mein aur[1] prateeksha nahin kee meree baat (aadesh) kee.
20|95|(moosa ne) poochhaah tera samaachaar kya hai, he saamaree
20|96|usane kahaah mainne vah cheez dekhee, jise unhonne nahin dekha, to mainne le lee ek mutthee rasool ke padchinh se, phir use phenk diya aur isee prakaar sujha diya mujhe[1] mere man ne.

20|97|moosa ne kahaah ja tere lie jeevan mein ye hona hai ki too kahata raheh mujhe sparsh na karana[1]. tatha tere lie ek aur[2] vachan hai, jisake virudhd kadaapi na hoga aur apane poojy ko dekh, jisaka pujaaree bana raha, ham avashy use jala denge, phir use uda denge nadee mein choor-choor karake.
20|98|nihsandeh tum sabhee ka poojy, bas allaah hai, koee poojy nahin hai, usake siva. vah samoye hue hai, pratyek vastu ko (apane) gyaan mein.
20|99|isee prakaar, (he nabee!) ham aapake samaksh vigat samaachaaron mein se kuchh ka varnan kar rahe hain aur hamane aapako pradaan kar dee hai apane paas se ek shiksha (quraan).
20|100|jo usase munh pherega, to vah nishchay pralay ke din laade hue hoga, bhaaree[1] bojh.
20|101|ve sada rahan vaale honge usamen aur pralay ke din unake lie bura bojh hoga.
20|102|jis din phoonk diya jaayega soor[1] (narasingha) mein, aur ham ekatr kar denge us din paapiyon ko, is dasha mein ki unakee aankhen (bhay se) neelee hongee.
20|103|ve aapas mein chupake-chupake kahenge ki tum (sansaar mein) bas das din rahe ho.
20|104|ham bhalee-bhaanti jaanate hain, jo kuchh ve kahenge, jis samay kahega unamen se sabase chatur ki tum keval ek hee din rahe[1] ho.
20|105|ve aapase prashn kar rahe hain parvaton ke sambandh mein? aap kah den ki uda dega unhen mera paalanahaar choor-choor karake.
20|106|phir dharatee ko chhod dega, samatal maidaan banaakar.
20|107|tum nahin dekhoge usamen koee tedhaapan aur na neech-oonch.

20|108|us din log peechhe chalenge pukaarane vaale ke, koee usase kataraayega nahin aur dheemee ho jaayengee aavaajen atyant krpaasheel ke lie, phir tum nahin sunoge kaanaaphoonsee kee aavaaz ke siva.
20|109|us din laabh nahin degee sifaarish, parantu jise aagya de atyant krpaasheel aur prasann ho usake[1] lie baat karane se.
20|110|vah jaanata hai, jo kuchh unake aage tatha peechhe hai aur ve usaka poora gyaan nahin rakhate.
